title: Debasis Bhattacharya - Quick Facts

Debasis Bhattacharya
Department | Materials Science
Research Area(s) | Synthesis and processing of meso porous ceramics for catalytic applications Nano HAP for biomedical applications High proton conductor for application in solid oxide fuel cell
Year Joined | 1984
email | [email protected]

title: Debasis Bhattacharya
text: Dr. Debasis Bhattachaya is the retired professor from Materials Science Centre, Indian Institute of technology Kharagpur, India. He received his Ph.D degree in Chemistry from Calcutta University, Kolkata, India. His research interests are proton conducting electrolyte materials for IT-SOFCs, synthesis and processing of meso porous ceramics for catalytic applications and Nano HAP for biomedical applications.
